differences.actualValue: <speak>In a few words, how can I help you with your current order. You can say things like, the order was already picked up by someone else, ore, problem with customers address.</speak>

text: <speak>In a few words, how can I help you with your current order. You can say things like, the order was already picked up by someone else, ore, problem with customers address.</speak>

agentUtterance.text: <speak>In a few words, how can I help you with your current order. You can say things like, the order was already picked up by someone else, ore, problem with customers address.</speak>

differences.actualValue: <speak>I think you're calling because the customer changed their delivery address, is that correct?</speak>

text: <speak>I think you're calling because the customer changed their delivery address, is that correct?</speak>

agentUtterance.text: <speak>I think you're calling because the customer changed their delivery address, is that correct?</speak>

differences.actualValue: <speak>Got it. If you are able to go to the new location, please do! You'll be paid for any extra time, and distance traveled, if the delivery address is further. Any applicable compensation will reflect on your trip statement as a delivery adjustment. Your payment won't be lower than the upfront fare. If you are unable, or unwilling to deliver to the new address, you can cancel the delivery yourself in the app, by selecting the order, then tap Cancel. For the reason, select "the customer changed the delivery address."</speak><speak>To listen to this message again, just say, repeat it. <break time="700ms"/> Is there anything else I can help you with today?</speak>

text: <speak>Got it. If you are able to go to the new location, please do! You'll be paid for any extra time, and distance traveled, if the delivery address is further. Any applicable compensation will reflect on your trip statement as a delivery adjustment. Your payment won't be lower than the upfront fare. If you are unable, or unwilling to deliver to the new address, you can cancel the delivery yourself in the app, by selecting the order, then tap Cancel. For the reason, select "the customer changed the delivery address."</speak>
<speak>To listen to this message again, just say, repeat it. <break time="700ms"/> Is there anything else I can help you with today?</speak>

agentUtterance.text:
<speak>Got it. If you are able to go to the new location, please do! You'll be paid for any extra time, and distance traveled, if the delivery address is further. Any applicable compensation will reflect on your trip statement as a delivery adjustment. Your payment won't be lower than the upfront fare. If you are unable, or unwilling to deliver to the new address, you can cancel the delivery yourself in the app, by selecting the order, then tap Cancel. For the reason, select "the customer changed the delivery address."</speak>
<speak>To listen to this message again, just say, repeat it. <break time="700ms"/> Is there anything else I can help you with today?</speak>
